description: Enterprise techniques used by SHOTPUT, ATT&CK software S0063 v1.1
name: SHOTPUT (S0063)

techniques.comment: [SHOTPUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0063) has a command to retrieve information about connected users.(Citation: Palo Alto CVE-2015-3113 July 2015)
[SHOTPUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0063) has a command to obtain a directory listing.(Citation: Palo Alto CVE-2015-3113 July 2015)
[SHOTPUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0063) is obscured using XOR encoding and appended to a valid GIF file.(Citation: FireEye Clandestine Wolf)(Citation: Palo Alto CVE-2015-3113 July 2015)
[SHOTPUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0063) has a command to obtain a process listing.(Citation: Palo Alto CVE-2015-3113 July 2015)

[SHOTPUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0063) has a command to list all servers in the domain, as well as one to locate domain controllers on a domain.(Citation: Palo Alto CVE-2015-3113 July 2015)
[SHOTPUT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0063) uses [netstat](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0104) to list TCP connection status.(Citation: Palo Alto CVE-2015-3113 July 2015)
